result.execSummary:
Devin D. Clayton was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Devin D. Clayton was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Devin D. Clayton

defendant.name: Clayton, Devin D.
defendant.address: E8961 County Rd N, Colfax, WI 54730

records.addlTxt:
(Case called at 3:30 PM) 
Defendant Devin Clayton appears in custody from the Eau Claire County Jail via videoconference without counsel.  District Attorney Peter Rindal appears for the State of Wisconsin.
Court has colloquy with the Defendant about assistance of an attorney and the extradition process.  Defendant signs waiver.  Court will sign waiver electronically.
Request for Release Modification or Change in Sentence with Court notes that extradition request was addressed in Court.

(11:03 AM case called.) Prosecuting attorney Tiffany M. Winter appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Devin D. Clayton appeared by video, in custody in the Eau Claire County Jail. Attorney Sonia L Anderson appeared by video for Devin D. Clayton.
Defendant acknowledges receipt of the complaint.
State requests the defendant be held without bail.
Attorney Anderson advises the defendant isn't sure if he wants to waive extradition.
Court orders the defendant is to be held without bail and if the defendant reviews the waiver of extradition with an attorney and decides he wants to sign, Court will make time on the calendar tomorrow.
Extradition hearing scheduled for February 28, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Extradition hearing on February 28, 2022 at 09:30 am.
